text: Thomas Ulsrud (21 October 1971 – 24 May 2022) was a Norwegian curler."About Team Ulsrud". TeamUlsrud.com. Retrieved 25 April 2010."Thomas Ulsrud, Curling" (Curling > Athletes). Vancouver Organizing Committee for the 2010 Olympic and Paralympic Winter Games. Retrieved 26 November 2010 from https://web.archive.org/."Thomas Ulsrud" (Profiles > Events). ASHAM World Curling Tour. Retrieved 4 May 2010. He was born in Oslo, Norway. He was the skip of the 2014 World champion Norwegian national team. He was a two-time European champion, 14-time Norwegian men's champion and Olympic silver medalist in the 2010 Winter Olympics. Ulsrud died on 24 May 2022 in Oslo from cancer, aged 50.Curling-legenden Thomas Ulsrud er død ==References== Category:1971 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for Norway Category:Sportspeople from Oslo Category:Cancer deaths in Norway Category:Curlers
title: Thomas Ulsrud
